author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In Dagestan's realm of Russian land,
Unleashes havoc, a scornful band.
Upon the altar, upon the pew,
They let incendiary fury slew.

Between the circles of the market's pole,
Stands Apple's name, a stoic role.
In pre-dawn lights, shares hold their breath,
Whilst the EU whispers of potential death.

In Germany's heart, the sentiment fades,
Business climates wane in shadowy glades.
Ifo's index in mournful decline,
Economists' forecasts are left behind.

feedItems.title: Terrorist Attacks in Russia's Dagestan Target Synagogue, Churches, Police
feedItems.description: Russian authorities said the assailants opened fire on houses of worship in Dagestan’s capital of Makhachkala and the city of Derbent.

feedItems.title: Apple Shares Largely Flat Following EU Charges Under New Tech Law
feedItems.description: Apple shares were largely flat in premarket exchanges after the European Union said the iPhone maker’s App Store rules might be in breach of the bloc’s Digital Markets Act.

feedItems.title: German Business Sentiment Declines on Gloomier Outlook
feedItems.description: The Ifo Institute’s business-climate index fell to 88.6 in June, against economists’ expectations it would rise to 89.6,

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Gold akin a steadfast goat, across the field does it scuttle,
In wait of clues, both clear and ripe, in inflation's subtle huddle.
Silver rabbits, brass-born dogs, a mixed-metal melee,
Whilst the falcon, monetary, has yet lost its way.

Dollar, a noble hound, gains ground in gaiety,
Despite vague shadows cast by data's instability,
In French grounds, a threat now looms, a darkened rally wakes,
A hedge for uncertainty, its favoured position takes.

Oil, the snail upon the leaf, a slow but sturdy feature,
In calm it lies, its breath is held, an attentive, cautious creature.
Flush before data’s stern reveal, the path of cuts untold,
A patient wait, a silent quake, as the week's tale unfolds.

feedItems.title: Gold Trades Flat; Investors Looking for New Catalysts
feedItems.description: Gold edged higher while base metals were mixed, as traders awaited fresh clues on the path of U.S. inflation and monetary policy.

feedItems.title: French Election Concerns Likely to Lift Dollar, Offseting Potential Weak U.S. Inflation Data
feedItems.description: The dollar has emerged the favored hedge for political uncertainty ahead of elections in France where the far-right National Rally party is expected to make significant gains, ING said.

feedItems.title: Oil Broadly Stable Ahead of U.S. Inflation Data This Week
feedItems.description: Oil prices were broadly stable early in the European session, as traders awaited key U.S. inflation data later in the week for more cues on the path of interest-rate cuts.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
From Apple tree, a tempest brews in Eoropa's wide expanse,
'Midst rules of digital marketplace, it's set to take a stance.
With search and ad, and app domain, where Godly power enhances,
This lore is forged of first charges, in Act's new fiery dance.

Paladin of Energy, from Austral's distant shore,
Doth join with Fission Uranium, in darkling mines ores bore.
Seeking to build a kingdom grand, midst fuel of nuclear core,
A global supplier to emerge, in this bold, audacious lore.

Hark! Hesitant German Bunds, in trading mire seep,
Directionless like a rudderless ship lost in the ocean's deep.
Awaiting Ifo data's call, as Loki's kin doth creep,
A weak pulse in market's heart, a hushed secret to keep.

feedItems.title: Apple Hit by First Charges Under New European Tech Law
feedItems.description: The charges are the first to be issued under the EU’s Digital Markets Act, which sets out a long list of rules aimed at boosting competition in digital advertising, online search and app ecosystems.

feedItems.title: Paladin Energy Agrees to Buy Fission Uranium
feedItems.description: Australian uranium company Paladin Energy has agreed to buy Canada’s Fission Uranium, aiming to create a globally significant supplier of the nuclear fuel.

feedItems.title: German Bunds Seen Trading Directionless Ahead of Ifo Data
feedItems.description: Bunds were lacking direction as the market awaited German Ifo data at 0800 GMT, which deserves more attention than usual after the surprisingly weak purchasing manager surveys on Friday, Commerzbank Research said.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In South Africa's soil and timeless hill,
A mad pursuit unfolds, for quartz they still.
Are healing crystals pain they query not?
Thus, in their search, God's humble earth is robbed in lot.

In the Black Sea, Ukraine’s vessels flew,
Against the tide of wars, unseen they grew.
Their wings unmanned, yet braced for battles high,
Their flight recalls God’s angels in the sky.

Brother Kellner's soul hath flown on high too,
Into the Lord's embrace, from mortal view.
From Fox's cradle, his path was sown,
Now in the Almighty's network, he's surely known.

feedItems.title: How 'Healing' Crystals Are Painful to Mine
feedItems.description: A global celebrity-driven craze for quartz has caused a rush to dig in backyards and hillsides in rural South Africa.

feedItems.title: How Ukraine's Naval Drones Turned the Tide in the Battle of the Black Sea
feedItems.description: Unmanned vessels developed in the fight against Russia are part of a revolution in modern warfare.

feedItems.title: Died: Jamie Kellner, 77, helped launch Fox network.
feedItems.description: Died: Jamie Kellner, 77, helped launch Fox network.
